name: Water
description:
Water is a branching interactive fiction about lucid dreaming. You wake up in an area with no idea how you got there and must try to piece together clues.

Features
  • Branching paths based on your decisions
  • Multiple endings

NOTE: The beginning of the story is meant to loop. So if you feel stuck, be sure to try previously clicked options.

If you donate, you'll receive a copy of this game's prequel.
